name: AdvanceDirectiveLegalFunction
title: Advance Directive Legal Function
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Kinds of advance directives by legal function rather than communication channel or clinical procedure),(Data Element Scope: Advance Directive Kind: Element used to capture the presence of an advanced directive or to classify a directive already recorded or linked),(Inclusion Criteria: Advance directive kinds by legal function of the directive),(Exclusion Criteria: Concepts that describe the communication channel used to communicate the directive (paper document, word of mouth), or that describes clinical procedure permissions (resuscitation, medication, etc.))

concept.display: Active Durable Power of Attorney for Healthcare (finding)
Willing to be donor of organ (finding)
